channel.title: Markdown on Techtaste
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Techtaste

item.title: Markdown guide
item.description:
Below are the basic syntaxes for writing markdown pages.

Highlighting

**bold**
__bold__

*Emphasis*
_Emphasis_

bold

bold

Emphasis

Emphasis

Lists

Unordered List

* list item 1
* list item 2
	* sub list item 1
	* sub list item 2
		* nested sub list item 1
		* nested sub list item 2
  • list item 1
  • list item 2
    • sub list item 1
    • sub list item 2
      • nested sub list item 1
      • nested sub list item 2

Ordered List

1. list item 1
2. list item 2
	1. sub list item 1
	2. sub list item 2
		1. nested sub list item 1
		2. nested sub list item 2
